basics.summary: Software Engineer who specializes in design and architecture of complex systems, with a focus on backend. I'm based in Hong Kong, but my day is spent on EU timezones, working in the afternoon and nights, spending my mornings as leisure.

work.name: GitStart Limited
work.summary: Backend development: Built multiple macroservices for various domains
highlights: API for integrations with various ticketing systems like Linear, GitHub and Jira, syncing thousands of issues and tickets daily
Build and run client repos in containerized and secure environments, using existing Dockerfiles in repos to ensure any tech stack could be built
Orchestrate hundreds of long-running background jobs daily, allowing GitSlice to push and pull in between hundreds of client repos and their gitsliced internal equivalents
Built a webhook processing engine which ingests thousands of webhooks from GitHub, Slack and other sources to process them async, while preserving order of processing
Modify the above engine to support internal webhooks between our macroservices, creating an internal message queue-ing service which handles thousands of internal messages and notifications daily
Built or contributed code to around 30 different GraphQL based macroservices serving different domains/concerns for GitStart

Stitched together all the macroservices into a federated GraphQL gateway service for easier consumption of APIs by our frontends and other clients. This gateway would go on to handle about 700000 GraphQL requests daily during workdays
